code: import React from"react";var NewItemPresentation=function NewItemPresentation(props){return React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:props.submitHandler},React.createElement("div",{className:"form-row"},React.createElement("div",{className:"form-group col-md-4"},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"title"},"Title"),React.createElement("input",{onChange:props.titleChangedHandler,type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"title",name:"title",value:props.title,required:true})),React.createElement("div",{className:"form-group col-md-4"},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"price"},"Price"),React.createElement("input",{onChange:props.priceChangedHandler,type:"number",step:"0.01",className:"form-control",id:"price",name:"price",value:props.price,required:true})),React.createElement("div",{className:"form-group col-md-4"},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"quantity"},"Quantity"),React.createElement("input",{onChange:props.quantityChangedHandler,type:"number",className:"form-control",id:"quantity",name:"quantity",value:props.quantity,required:true}))),React.createElement("div",{className:"form-group"},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"image"},"Image URL"),React.createElement("input",{onChange:props.imageChangedHandler,type:"url",className:"form-control",id:"image",name:"image",value:props.image,required:true})),React.createElement("div",{className:"form-group"},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"description"},"Description"),React.createElement("textarea",{onChange:props.descriptionChangedHandler,rows:"3",className:"form-control",id:"description",name:"description",value:props.description,required:true})),React.createElement("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-light"},"SUBMIT"));};export default NewItemPresentation;
